resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103521</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103521</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1805974027</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Electromagnetic Spectrum Poster</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektromagnetisches Spektrum-Plakat</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Affiche de Spectre Électromagnétique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Poster Do Spectrum Eletromagnético</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Manifesto Di Spettro Elettromagnetico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ηλεκτρομαγνητική αφίσα φάσματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cartel Del Espectro Electromágnetico</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Explore the range of electromagnetic radiation from radio waves to gamma rays using this PDF version of our popular poster.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erforschen Sie die Strecke der elektromagnetischen
Strahlung von den Funkwellen zu den gamma Strahlen mit dieser pdf 
Version unseres populären Plakats.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Explorez l'intervalle du rayonnement 
électromagnétique des ondes radio aux rayons gamma en utilisant 
cette version de pdf de notre affiche populaire.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Explore a escala da radiação eletromagnética 
das ondas de rádio aos raios gamma usando esta versão do pdf de 
nosso poster popular.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esplori la gamma di radiazione elettromagnetica 
dalle onde radio ai raggi gamma usando questa versione del pdf del 
nostro manifesto popolare.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ερευνήστε τη σειρά της ηλεκτρομαγνητικής ακτινοβολίας 
από τα ραδιο κύματα στις ακτίνες γάμμα χρησιμοποιώντας αυτήν την
έκδοση PDF της δημοφιλούς αφίσας μας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Explore el rango de la radiación 
electromágnetica de las ondas de radio a los rayos gammas usando esta
versión del pdf de nuestro cartel popular.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1805974027</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103521</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/electromagnetic-spectrum-poster</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
